column4: hmm... in power management preferences, if I set the "put computer to sleep when inactive" to 10 minutes. does the computer counts intself as inactive if I stream from it to my xbox?
yes, most likely unless the program you're using can poke the gnome-screensaver and keep it from turning on.
hmm... actually i am sharing my video files via samba. maybe it doesnt matter.
why is a fileserver set to sleep anyway?
